sentence.Network_cn: 一个人不应该妨碍他人进步.

sentence.Network_en: At no time did I make an attempt to impede any investigatory effort.
sentence.Network_cn: 我绝没有试图妨碍过任何调查工作。

sentence.Network_en: Severe steric effects at the reactive carbon would impede the substitution.
sentence.Network_cn: 大的立体效应阻止在碳上的取代.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Latin impedire 'shackle the feet of', based on pes, ped- 'foot'. Compare with impeach

entry.def: If you impede someone or something, you make their movement, development, or progress difficult.

example.ex: Fallen rock is impeding the progress of rescue workers.
example.tran: 坠落的石头阻滞了救援人员的救援进程。

means.word_mean: 1. be a hindrance or obstacle to;

sentences.sentence: "She is impeding the progress of our project"

auth_sentence.content: Both sides said the disagreement would not significantly impede relations.
auth_sentence.res_content: Both sides said the disagreement would not significantly impede relations.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Both sides said the disagreement would not significantly impede relations.

auth_sentence.content: Some researchers have claimed that debriefing can actually impede recovery.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some researchers have claimed that debriefing can actually impede recovery.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some researchers have claimed that debriefing can actually impede recovery.

auth_sentence.content: Jenkins says the attackers used hostages to impede the police response.
auth_sentence.res_content: Jenkins says the attackers used hostages to impede the police response.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Jenkins says the attackers used hostages to impede the police response.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =foot,表示"足,脚"; 2. =child/education,表示"儿童"; 3. 引申为"教育"

stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+ped足,脚+ient→能把脚跨出去→方便
expedite[v.使加速,促进]+ious……的→adj.迅速的,敏捷的
ped足,脚+estrian……的人→用脚走路的人
bi两+ped足,脚→n.两足动物
centi一百+ped足,脚+e→一百只脚的动物
ex出+ped足,脚+ient→能把脚跨出去→方便
expedite[v.使加速,促进]+ion→n.远征[队],探险[队]
impedi=impede[v.妨碍]+ment物→n.妨碍,阻碍物
ped足,脚+al→n.踏板 v.踩踏板,骑自行车
ped足,脚+estrian……的人→用脚走路的人
pod=ped足,脚+iatrist专家→n.足病医生
quadru四+ped足,脚→n.四足动物
ped教育+agog引导+y→引导教学→教学法
ped教育+ant人→受过教育的人→书呆子
pedant[n.迂腐之人,书呆子]+ry状态,性质→n.迂腐
ped儿童+istiatr专家,医生→n.儿科医师
ped儿童+ology学科→n.儿科学
ex出+ped足,脚+ite促成→把脚跨出去→加快
im进入+ped足,脚+e→把脚放进去→妨碍
ped足,脚+al→n.踏板 v.踩踏板,骑自行车

means.word_mean: 阻碍, 妨碍, 阻止

sentences.en: He was impeded in his work.

jushi.english: Their advance was seriously impeded by the bad weather.
jushi.chinese: 因天气恶劣,他们的前进严重受阻。
